text: Kuma ku tabbata a cikin gidajenku,* kuma kada ku yi fitar gaye-gaye irin fitar gaye-gaye ta jahiliyyar farko. Kuma ku tsai da salla, kuma ku bayar da zakka, ku yi É—a, a ga Allah da ManzonSa. Allah na nufin Ya tafiyar da Æ™azamta kawai daga gare ku, ya mutanen Babban Gida! Kuma Ya tsarkake ku, tsarkakewa
